1481693301715738627.text: If this bill passes the Senate and makes it to President Biden’s desk and is signed into law —and I hope and pray it does — the courts will overturn the partisan, discriminatory gerrymanders that our state legislature is pushing.

1481693300151173125.text:
Today, the House passed Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act while Tennessee Republicans are rushing through redistricting maps that divide communities across the state. 

It’s a split screen of Congress trying to strengthen our democracy while the state seeks to erode it.

1481364034721038341.text: There is still time for the General Assembly to come to its senses and stop crippling Nashville. But the Senate Committee will have to refuse to rubber stamp this gerrymander when it meets tomorrow.

1481364033278291969.text: We ain’t broke here in Nashville, so the legislature has no business “fixing” us. Some folks on the committee are people I’ve known all my life and what they are doing is wrong.

1481364029230698508.text: It is not conservative to break up a city that has remained politically whole for 230 years. In fact, it is gross legislative overreach to interfere with one of the most admired cities in America.

1481364027683057664.text: All Nashvillians should feel insulted and abused by the new map. For 100 years, Nashvillians have freely chosen Democratic representatives in Congress, but that tradition is about to end. What Republicans could not win in local elections, they are stealing through gerrymandering.

1481364026181533704.text: The map was released for the first time today and the more people learn about it, the more they will hate it. The Tennessee Titans stadium will be in one district, and the team’s practice facility in another – this makes no sense.

1481364024969289729.text: The damage this map does to the political influence of minority groups in Nashville is devastating. Our robust, diverse communities in Nashville are represented and affirmed in Washington, DC today when Nashville has its own voice in Congress.

1481364023803318272.text: Under the new map announced today, Nashvillians will be reduced from proud citizens of a capital city to captives inside three colonies run from Clarksville, Cookeville, and Columbia.

1481364022666616834.text: As I’ve been warning for almost a year, the General Assembly has formally begun gerrymandering Nashville and Davidson County into political oblivion.
